title: So Ive been accepted for the league client alpha, any requests from those not in it for tests?
body:
Ill ofc do my usual thing and just try to break the crap out of it but if anyone has their own ideas or gripes and isnt in the alpha just hit me up and ill be happy to oblige.

To be frank the entry bar for the alpha is pretty low so most people who are interested should be in by now but meh may aswell put the offer out there.
